data.name: Alice
data.text: 为什么是未经证实的传闻

post.text:
这里是「清华外语角」。和小伙伴们面对面，一起练习你的外语吧！ 虽然大部分朋友想练英语，也有想练习其他语言的朋友。
Here is the THU language Corner. Come face to face with your friends and practice your foreign language together. Although most of friends want to practice English, there are also friends who want to practice other languages.
